original_text: For the tithe of the people of Israel, which they present as a contribution to the Lord, I have given to the Levites for an inheritance. Therefore I have said of them that they shall have no inheritance among the people of Israel.”
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 여호와께 거제로 드리는 십일조를 레위인에게 기업으로 주었으므로 내가 그들에 대하여 말하기를 이스라엘 자손 중에 기업이 없을 것이라 하였노라

sentences.original_text: For the tithe of the people of Israel,
which they present as a contribution to the Lord,
I have given to the Levites for an inheritance.
Therefore I have said of them
that they shall have no inheritance among the people of Israel.”
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이스라엘 백성 중에서 유산을 가지지 못할 것이라.
